text: Arash kay uthaney walay aur uss kay aas pass kay (farishtay) apnay rab ki tasbeeh hamd kay sath sath kertay hain aur uss per eman rakhtay hain aur eman walon kay liye istaghfaar kertay hain kehtay hain kay aey humaray perwerdigar! Tu ney her cheez ko apni bakhsish aur ilm say gher rakha hai pus tu enhen bakhash day jo toba keren aur teri raah ki perwi keren aur tu enhen dozakh kay azab say bhi bacha lay
